title: datamodule
text:
Getters


CsvGetter

 CsvGetter (fpath)

Initialize self. See help(type(self)) for accurate signature.
df = CsvGetter(fpath)()
test_eq(df.shape,(490737,3))

title: datamodule
text:
Setters


SizeSplitter

 SizeSplitter (sizes=None)

Initialize self. See help(type(self)) for accurate signature.
df = CsvGetter(fpath)()
dataset = SizeSplitter()(df)
test_eq(dataset.train.shape,(242680, 3))
test_eq(dataset.keys(),['train','valid','test'])

title: datamodule
text:
DataModule


DataModule

 DataModule (getter, splitter)

Initialize self. See help(type(self)) for accurate signature.
dm = DataModule(CsvGetter(fpath),SizeSplitter())
test_eq(dm.datasets.train.shape,(242680, 3))
test_eq(dm.datasets.keys(),['train','valid','test'])

title: models
text:
RandomModel

 RandomModel (action_probs)

Initialize self. See help(type(self)) for accurate signature.
dm = DataModule(CsvGetter(fpath),SizeSplitter())
action_probs = {'buy':.5,'short':.1}
h0 = RandomModel(action_probs)
_out = h0(dm.datasets.train.sample(1000))
assert _out[_out.action=='buy'].shape[0] > _out[_out.action=='short'].shape[0]*2
